## Functions

### expandFPToI() {#a46482b2bd77de78d901bfa2fd727ba0e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void expandFPToI (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; FPToI)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to convert a fp number to integer, replacing FPToS(U)I with the generated code.

This currently generates code similarly to compiler-rt&#39;s implementations.

An example IR generated from compiler-rt/fixsfdi.c looks like below: define dso&#95;local i64 @foo(float noundef a) local&#95;unnamed&#95;addr #0 &#123; entry: %0 = bitcast float a to i32 conv.i = zext i32 %0 to i64 tobool.not = icmp sgt i32 %0, -1 conv = select i1 tobool.not, i64 1, i64 -1 and = lshr i64 conv.i, 23 shr = and i64 and, 255 and2 = and i64 conv.i, 8388607 or = or i64 and2, 8388608 cmp = icmp ult i64 shr, 127 br i1 cmp, label cleanup, label if.end

if.end: ; preds = entry sub = add nuw nsw i64 shr, 4294967169 conv5 = and i64 sub, 4294967232 cmp6.not = icmp eq i64 conv5, 0 br i1 cmp6.not, label if.end12, label if.then8

if.then8: ; preds = if.end cond11 = select i1 tobool.not, i64 9223372036854775807, i64 -9223372036854775808 br label cleanup

if.end12: ; preds = if.end cmp13 = icmp ult i64 shr, 150 br i1 cmp13, label if.then15, label if.else

if.then15: ; preds = if.end12 sub16 = sub nuw nsw i64 150, shr shr17 = lshr i64 or, sub16 mul = mul nsw i64 shr17, conv br label cleanup

if.else: ; preds = if.end12 sub18 = add nsw i64 shr, -150 shl = shl i64 or, sub18 mul19 = mul nsw i64 shl, conv br label cleanup

cleanup: ; preds = entry, if.else, if.then15, if.then8 retval.0 = phi i64 &#91; cond11, if.then8 &#93;, &#91; mul, if.then15 &#93;, &#91; mul19, if.else &#93;, &#91; 0, entry &#93; ret i64 retval.0 &#125;

Replace fp to integer with generated code.

Definition at line <a href="#l00090">90</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargefpconvert-cpp">ExpandLargeFpConvert.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

### expandIToFP() {#a0f218e3451638c34910744dedf0b71ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void expandIToFP (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42; IToFP)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
Generate code to convert a fp number to integer, replacing S(U)IToFP with the generated code.

This currently generates code similarly to compiler-rt&#39;s implementations. This implementation has an implicit assumption that integer width is larger than fp.

An example IR generated from compiler-rt/floatdisf.c looks like below: define dso&#95;local float @&#95;&#95;floatdisf(i64 noundef a) local&#95;unnamed&#95;addr #0 &#123; entry: cmp = icmp eq i64 a, 0 br i1 cmp, label return, label if.end

if.end: ; preds = entry shr = ashr i64 a, 63 xor = xor i64 shr, a sub = sub nsw i64 xor, shr %0 = tail call i64 @llvm.ctlz.i64(i64 sub, i1 true), !range !5 cast = trunc i64 %0 to i32 sub1 = sub nuw nsw i32 64, cast sub2 = xor i32 cast, 63 cmp3 = icmp ult i32 cast, 40 br i1 cmp3, label if.then4, label if.else

if.then4: ; preds = if.end switch i32 sub1, label sw.default &#91; i32 25, label sw.bb i32 26, label sw.epilog &#93;

sw.bb: ; preds = if.then4 shl = shl i64 sub, 1 br label sw.epilog

sw.default: ; preds = if.then4 sub5 = sub nsw i64 38, %0 sh&#95;prom = and i64 sub5, 4294967295 shr6 = lshr i64 sub, sh&#95;prom shr9 = lshr i64 274877906943, %0 and = and i64 shr9, sub cmp10 = icmp ne i64 and, 0 conv11 = zext i1 cmp10 to i64 or = or i64 shr6, conv11 br label sw.epilog

sw.epilog: ; preds = sw.default, if.then4, sw.bb a.addr.0 = phi i64 &#91; or, sw.default &#93;, &#91; sub, if.then4 &#93;, &#91; shl, sw.bb &#93; %1 = lshr i64 a.addr.0, 2 %2 = and i64 %1, 1 or16 = or i64 %2, a.addr.0 inc = add nsw i64 or16, 1 %3 = and i64 inc, 67108864 tobool.not = icmp eq i64 %3, 0 spec.select.v = select i1 tobool.not, i64 2, i64 3 spec.select = ashr i64 inc, spec.select.v spec.select56 = select i1 tobool.not, i32 sub2, i32 sub1 br label if.end26

if.else: ; preds = if.end sub23 = add nuw nsw i64 %0, 4294967256 sh&#95;prom24 = and i64 sub23, 4294967295 shl25 = shl i64 sub, sh&#95;prom24 br label if.end26

if.end26: ; preds = sw.epilog, if.else a.addr.1 = phi i64 &#91; shl25, if.else &#93;, &#91; spec.select, sw.epilog &#93; e.0 = phi i32 &#91; sub2, if.else &#93;, &#91; spec.select56, sw.epilog &#93; conv27 = trunc i64 shr to i32 and28 = and i32 conv27, -2147483648 add = shl nuw nsw i32 e.0, 23 shl29 = add nuw nsw i32 add, 1065353216 conv31 = trunc i64 a.addr.1 to i32 and32 = and i32 conv31, 8388607 or30 = or i32 and32, and28 or33 = or i32 or30, shl29 %4 = bitcast i32 or33 to float br label return

return: ; preds = entry, if.end26 retval.0 = phi float &#91; %4, if.end26 &#93;, &#91; 0.000000e+00, entry &#93; ret float retval.0 &#125;

Replace integer to fp with generated code.

Definition at line <a href="#l00309">309</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/expandlargefpconvert-cpp">ExpandLargeFpConvert.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate code to convert a fp number to integer, replacing FPToS(U)I with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the generated code. This currently generates code similarly to compiler-rt&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implementations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An example IR generated from compiler-rt/fixsfdi.c looks like below:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><Highlight kind="comment">/// define dso&#95;local i64 @foo(float noundef %a) local&#95;unnamed&#95;addr #0 &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entry:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %0 = bitcast float %a to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv.i = zext i32 %0 to i64</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %tobool.not = icmp sgt i32 %0, -1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv = select i1 %tobool.not, i64 1, i64 -1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %and = lshr i64 %conv.i, 23</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shr = and i64 %and, 255</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %and2 = and i64 %conv.i, 8388607</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %or = or i64 %and2, 8388608</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp = icmp ult i64 %shr, 127</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %cmp, label %cleanup, label %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="57"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="58"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.end:                                           ; preds = %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub = add nuw nsw i64 %shr, 4294967169</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="60"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv5 = and i64 %sub, 4294967232</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="61"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp6.not = icmp eq i64 %conv5, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="62"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %cmp6.not, label %if.end12, label %if.then8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="63"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="64"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.then8:                                         ; preds = %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="65"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cond11 = select i1 %tobool.not, i64 9223372036854775807, i64 -9223372036854775808</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %cleanup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.end12:                                         ; preds = %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp13 = icmp ult i64 %shr, 150</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %cmp13, label %if.then15, label %if.else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.then15:                                        ; preds = %if.end12</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub16 = sub nuw nsw i64 150, %shr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shr17 = lshr i64 %or, %sub16</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %mul = mul nsw i64 %shr17, %conv</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %cleanup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.else:                                          ; preds = %if.end12</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub18 = add nsw i64 %shr, -150</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shl = shl i64 %or, %sub18</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %mul19 = mul nsw i64 %shl, %conv</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %cleanup</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="comment">/// cleanup:                                          ; preds = %entry, %if.else, %if.then15, %if.then8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %retval.0 = phi i64 &#91; %cond11, %if.then8 &#93;, &#91; %mul, %if.then15 &#93;, &#91; %mul19, %if.else &#93;, &#91; 0, %entry &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret i64 %retval.0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace fp to integer with generated code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90" lineLink="#a46482b2bd77de78d901bfa2fd727ba0e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a46482b2bd77de78d901bfa2fd727ba0e">expandFPToI</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;FPToI) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/irbuilder">IRBuilder&lt;&gt;</a> Builder(FPToI);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  FPToI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction/#a601ee49a4c4e0babf29bd1cf09036570">eraseFromParent</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Generate code to convert a fp number to integer, replacing S(U)IToFP with</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the generated code. This currently generates code similarly to compiler-rt&#39;s</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">/// implementations. This implementation has an implicit assumption that integer</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">/// width is larger than fp.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An example IR generated from compiler-rt/floatdisf.c looks like below:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"><Highlight kind="comment">/// define dso&#95;local float @&#95;&#95;floatdisf(i64 noundef %a) local&#95;unnamed&#95;addr #0 &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="comment">/// entry:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp = icmp eq i64 %a, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %cmp, label %return, label %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.end:                                           ; preds = %entry</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shr = ashr i64 %a, 63</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %xor = xor i64 %shr, %a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub = sub nsw i64 %xor, %shr</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %0 = tail call i64 @llvm.ctlz.i64(i64 %sub, i1 true), !range !5</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cast = trunc i64 %0 to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub1 = sub nuw nsw i32 64, %cast</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub2 = xor i32 %cast, 63</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp3 = icmp ult i32 %cast, 40</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br i1 %cmp3, label %if.then4, label %if.else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.then4:                                         ; preds = %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">///   switch i32 %sub1, label %sw.default &#91;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="comment">///     i32 25, label %sw.bb</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"><Highlight kind="comment">///     i32 26, label %sw.epilog</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="comment">///   &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sw.bb:                                            ; preds = %if.then4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shl = shl i64 %sub, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %sw.epilog</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sw.default:                                       ; preds = %if.then4</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub5 = sub nsw i64 38, %0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sh&#95;prom = and i64 %sub5, 4294967295</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shr6 = lshr i64 %sub, %sh&#95;prom</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shr9 = lshr i64 274877906943, %0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %and = and i64 %shr9, %sub</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %cmp10 = icmp ne i64 %and, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv11 = zext i1 %cmp10 to i64</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %or = or i64 %shr6, %conv11</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %sw.epilog</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="comment">/// sw.epilog:                                        ; preds = %sw.default, %if.then4, %sw.bb</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %a.addr.0 = phi i64 &#91; %or, %sw.default &#93;, &#91; %sub, %if.then4 &#93;, &#91; %shl, %sw.bb &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %1 = lshr i64 %a.addr.0, 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %2 = and i64 %1, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %or16 = or i64 %2, %a.addr.0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %inc = add nsw i64 %or16, 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %3 = and i64 %inc, 67108864</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %tobool.not = icmp eq i64 %3, 0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %spec.select.v = select i1 %tobool.not, i64 2, i64 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %spec.select = ashr i64 %inc, %spec.select.v</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %spec.select56 = select i1 %tobool.not, i32 %sub2, i32 %sub1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %if.end26</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.else:                                          ; preds = %if.end</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sub23 = add nuw nsw i64 %0, 4294967256</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %sh&#95;prom24 = and i64 %sub23, 4294967295</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shl25 = shl i64 %sub, %sh&#95;prom24</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %if.end26</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="comment">/// if.end26:                                         ; preds = %sw.epilog, %if.else</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %a.addr.1 = phi i64 &#91; %shl25, %if.else &#93;, &#91; %spec.select, %sw.epilog &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %e.0 = phi i32 &#91; %sub2, %if.else &#93;, &#91; %spec.select56, %sw.epilog &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv27 = trunc i64 %shr to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %and28 = and i32 %conv27, -2147483648</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %add = shl nuw nsw i32 %e.0, 23</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %shl29 = add nuw nsw i32 %add, 1065353216</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %conv31 = trunc i64 %a.addr.1 to i32</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %and32 = and i32 %conv31, 8388607</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %or30 = or i32 %and32, %and28</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %or33 = or i32 %or30, %shl29</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %4 = bitcast i32 %or33 to float</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="comment">///   br label %return</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="comment">/// return:                                           ; preds = %entry, %if.end26</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="comment">///   %retval.0 = phi float &#91; %4, %if.end26 &#93;, &#91; 0.000000e+00, %entry &#93;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="comment">///   ret float %retval.0</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="comment">/// &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Replace integer to fp with generated code.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309" lineLink="#a0f218e3451638c34910744dedf0b71ac"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#a0f218e3451638c34910744dedf0b71ac">expandIToFP</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instruction">Instruction</a> &#42;IToFP) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FPMantissaWidth = IToFP-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value/#a0344a49526443edf90cc0aef3abd3337">getType</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#ad9b99a13e459cb18bb386ddd610ecf8c">getFPMantissaWidth</a>() - 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// fp80 conversion is implemented by conversion tp fp128 first following</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a fptrunc to fp80.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  FPMantissaWidth = FPMantissaWidth == 63 ? 112 : FPMantissaWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// FIXME: As there is no related builtins added in compliler-rt,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// here currently utilized the fp32 &lt;-&gt; fp16 lib calls to implement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  FPMantissaWidth = FPMantissaWidth == 10 ? 23 : FPMantissaWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  FPMantissaWidth = FPMantissaWidth == 7 ? 23 : FPMantissaWidth;</Highlight></CodeLine>
